txt.en: 'I know not how many centuries have passed since dwarf-feet trode upon these paths, yet many Zhélruka do so now! They say upon the well-marked path you cannot go astray.\n\n'Let us do our part to help them and polish up old road markers. I will polish the large ones. Will you look after the smaller ones?'
You should talk to Rúzat, who can be found at Dôm Goru in Ered Mithrin.
Help Rúzat polish the road markers so that the Zhélruka travellers can more easily find their way.
You should polish road markers that can be found along the path between Erebor and Dôm Goru in Ered Mithrin.
Talk to Rúzat at Dôm Goru

'We poor Zhélruka have travelled far, farther than you can imagine, only to reach Erebor. Here the way is harder and harsher than ever. I will linger here and tend to my brethren as they come through.\n\n'You will not linger but go on, I know. Yet I will be ever thankful for your friendly help and the road we shared.'
